withdrawn_explanation:
Applications for the grant closed on 19 December 2024.

We have published:

  • guidance onestablishing school-based nursery provision
  • data on schools which applied, and a list of successful applicants

We have contacted all applicants to tell them the outcome of their application. There is no appeals process.

We will send successful applicants more instructions, including:

  • a grant agreement that they must sign
  • terms and conditions of the grant
  • information about a support package to help you through your project
